tool_description: Encryptly Hashing API is a versatile cryptographic tool that empowers developers and security enthusiasts. Secure your data using state-of-the-art encryption algorithms like SHA-256, MD5, and SHA-1, or retrieve hashed information seamlessly. With EncryptlyAPI, you can effortlessly encrypt sensitive data, apply robust hashing algorithms, and search your database for hashed information within our collaborative community. Other supported algorithms, including SHA-224, SHA-384, SHA-512, and more,...
name: Encryptly Hashing API
title: Encryptly Hashing API

api_list.name: get_all_encryption_algorithms
api_list.description: The "get_all_encryption_algorithms" endpoint provides a list of all available encryption algorithms. Easily retrieve a comprehensive catalog of encryption methods to help you make informed choices for your data security needs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://encryptly-hashing-api.p.rapidapi.com/algorithms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "encryptly-hashing-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://encryptly-hashing-api.p.rapidapi.com/algorithms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "encryptly-hashing-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
